title: Impeachment Hearings & Hong Kong
itunes:title: Impeachment Hearings & Hong Kong
description:
Kevin spoke with Colin Reed, GOP Strategist & Managing Director at the Levinson Group, and Ty Matsdorf, Senior Vice President at the Messina Group and former Executive Director for the 2016 Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee.

They discussed the impeachment hearings, Hong Kong, Trade, USMCA & Turkey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
